description: G.1 Various Species - Crown lift all trees to 3m from ground level.T.1 Elm - Remove fallen limb on grass (exempt).S.1 Cut down stump on perimeter (exempt).T.2 Willow - Crown lift to 4m from ground level.T.3 Beech - Fell.  (Terminal decline).G.2 Plum - 2m Holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points.G.2 Sycamore - 1m Holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points.G.2 Privet - Trim to shape as hedge (exempt).G.2 Pine - Deadwood (exempt).T.4 Beech - Lateral reduction to provide 2m clearance from building and reduce height to 3m matching rest of Beech hedge.T.5 Plum - 1m Lateral reduction over tarmac area.H.6 Mixed hedge - Trim and tidy (exempt).
